column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThe MSc Healthcare Facilities is the only programme currently available in the UK and abroad that leads to a degree specialised on healthcare built environment, either as healthcare architect or healthcare planner. This is a very multifaceted area of the built environment and there are very few professionals that have academic qualifications in the for of a degree to address the complexity involved.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
